description: Provides a resource to create security group rule.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

CidrIp.description: An IP address network or segment, and conflict with `source_sgid`.

Description.description: Description of the security group rule.

IpProtocol.description: Type of ip protocol, the available value include `TCP`, `UDP` and `ICMP`. Default to all types protocol.

Policy.description: Rule policy of security group, the available value include `ACCEPT` and `DROP`.

PortRange.description: Range of the port. The available value can be one, multiple or one segment. E.g. `80`, `80,90` and `80-90`. Default to all ports.

SecurityGroupId.description: ID of the security group to be queried.

SourceSgid.description: ID of the nested security group, and conflict with `cidr_ip`.

Type.description: Type of the security group rule, the available value include `ingress` and `egress`.
